argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | bj-lineq.a | |- ( ph -> A e. CC ) |
| 2 |  | bj-lineq.b | |- ( ph -> B e. CC ) |
| 3 |  | bj-lineq.x | |- ( ph -> X e. CC ) |
| 4 |  | bj-lineq.y | |- ( ph -> Y e. CC ) |
| 5 |  | bj-lineq.n0 | |- ( ph -> A =/= 0 ) |
| 6 |  | bj-lineqi.1 | |- ( ph -> ( ( A x. X ) + B ) = Y ) |
| 7 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 | #P_bj-lineq | |- ( ph -> ( ( ( A x. X ) + B ) = Y <-> X = ( ( Y - B ) / A ) ) ) |
| 8 | 6, 7 | #P_mpbid | |- ( ph -> X = ( ( Y - B ) / A ) ) |
